selected_quotes: Stunning illustrations from The Animal Kingdom of the Baron Cuvier (1835)
@museumsvictoria @BioDivLibrary @mayrlibrary Amongst all this brilliant colour is a single uncoloured plate (Cuvier's The Anima…
Just had a minor panic that our new scanner was turning animals blue but, no, the originals are blue too - phew!
So beautiful - had to share! #FridayFeeling Hooray for wildlife all over the world :-)
